page.title: 12Government in Ballantrae.
page.content: Ballantrae is part of the Parliamentary constituency known as Carrick,Cumnock and Doon Valley and is served by a Labour M.P. We have a Conservative councillor on Kyle and Carrick District Council and a Conservative councillor on Strathclyde Regional Council.The Regional Council is responsible for education,social work,community services,roads,water, sewerage,lighting,assessor,fire services,children's panel and industrial development.The District Council is responsible for housing, cleansing,licensing,magistrates courts libraries and museums,leisure and recreation,planning and environmental services and tourism.There is an auxiliary H.M.Coastguard station.
